div.p: Blissfield Community Schools Board of Education Meeting
Executive Order 2020-21 prohibits all public gatherings of any number of
people until after May 1, 2020. This requires the Blissfield Community Schools
Board of Education to meet electronically.
Zoom will be the platform used and instructions on how to use
Zoom can be found at this link:
The link below contains the meeting link call in number, and other required information.

Click on this link to preregister your child for kindergarten in 2020-21.
Blissfield 2020-21 Kindergarten Preregistration.

span.a: PDF File Governor Closes Michigan Schools
